# thunder_debug_ospf_nsm (Resource)

`thunder_debug_ospf_nsm`: OSPFv3 NSM information

__PLACEHOLDER__

## Example Usage

```terraform

  address  = var.dut9049
  username = var.username
  password = var.password
}
resource "thunder_debug_ospf_nsm" "thunder_debug_ospf_nsm" {
  interface    = 0
  redistribute = 0
}
```
